enb_long_title: TWELFTH SESSION OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES OF THE UNFCCC
sentences: Delegates emphasized the importance of policies and measures (P&Ms) in ensuring implementation of Protocol commitments, and supported proposals for future workshops.

The EU highlighted the importance of, inter alia, considering different national and sectoral circumstances when evaluating P&Ms, and quantifying the effectiveness of Annex I Parties' domestic action.
SWITZERLAND, opposed by the G-77/CHINA, proposed that a contact group be established using the Chair's consolidated text as a basis for discussion.
